website_summaries.verdict: Good for larger feet, these single-use insoles keep your feet warm without adhesive that can affect your socks or shoes.
pros: Thin and comfortable in your footwear
Long enough to keep your whole foot warm
cons: Since there's no adhesive, they tend to bunch up if you walk a lot with them in your shoes

customer_reviews.title: you need excellent footwear (boots and socks) but helps tip the balance ...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby is a mail man, and has to work some days in below zero weather. Those days he wears these and they keep him warm. We have tried so many products to help keep him warm in the winter months. And many of them are sub par. Finally, we have something that will work. Of course, you need excellent footwear (boots and socks) but helps tip the balance on those really frigid days. This is a keeper. Will by buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Too hard and TOO HOT!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these because they are a LOT cheaper than the HotHands brand insole foot warmers. However, they are stiff AND get SO HOT that I can't keep them in my shoes!! I will not buy these again and will go back to HotHands. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mac

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Worst foot warmers used. The warming material is loose and slides around making it very uncomfortable to wear. They feel as if you are walking with your boots full of sand. Will purchase Hot hand and feet warmers next time. I thought I was helping environment buying biodegradable product.
customer_reviews.author: JIm

customer_reviews.title: Warm Feet
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these insoles. They have kept my feet toasty on 3-4 hour bike rides with temps as low as 15* The only complaint and the difference between 4 and 5 stars is they could be a little longer. By the end of these rides, my heels were cold, as I had them all the way down by the toes and I wear a 9 1/2 shoe. Don't know if they last 8 hours, but they gave me a solid 4 and that is all I wanted. Will be buying them again
customer_reviews.author: Steven G

customer_reviews.title: Keeps feet warm and toasty for an entire shift workings nights!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best and great value. My hands and feet are the first thing that get really cold and I work out in the weather every night and when the temps drop down into the 20’s and teens then my feet will literally freeze. I bought these to keep my feet warm and they absolutely work. I will keep buying these as long as the winter months are at hand! They also last threw out my entire shift! You cannot go wrong with these and also they send you a free little gift and that is really great! I don’t know if anyone else that will do that! Keep up the great work guys!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: I love love these--my feet are always cold
customer_reviews.text: I love love these--my feet are always cold. I work outside in sometimes frigid weather. Since I have been using these I don't worry about having icy feet. I just put these in my boots - I don't stick them to my socks. If I need to it is easy to put a new set in my boots and get back to work. I will be ordering another box soon!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: To warm for walking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these foot warmers to wear for walking in the winter. I wore them in January for a women's march and the temperature was 30 degrees. The foot warmers warmed up quickly as advertised and I put them in my hiking boots under my smart wool socks. If I were sitting at a tailgate event or in a stadium they would have been great but walking on them they were way to hot and I had to take them out as I was afraid I would burn my feet and they were way to hot for comfort. I put them in my mittens and and they were ok as I could control the amount and duration of skin contact.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Alaska fishing/crabbing in winter
customer_reviews.text: These worked phenomenally on a small metal fishing boat in Alaska. Cold Seeped from the cold ocean water through the metal boat, through my boots and into my body while fishing. I was chilled regardless of layers up top. Then I added these feet warmers to my boots and had to reduce upper body layers because I was toasty warm from the feet up life savers! Enjoyed many and he fishing and crabbing with these warmers.
customer_reviews.author: HeliFlyer

customer_reviews.title: Useful but...
customer_reviews.text: So as an overall review, these insoles work great! I bought them because my feet get numb and extremely cold when I’m skiing, and I did find these helpful. The ONLY problem is that once positioned into my ski boot, which is pretty tight, it’s hard to slip my foot in without the insoles getting all bulky and not flat. It can get very uncomfortable. They were advertised as adhesive insoles but I never found out how to stick them to my boot.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Lunardelli

customer_reviews.title: Because my feet are warm, I can sleep at night.
customer_reviews.text: I like that these inner soles do not have adhesive, so when they've used their heat, I don't have to wrestle them out of my shoe or slipper. I'm 81, and in the last couple of years, my feet are always colder than the rest of me. When I go to bed, if my feet are really icy, I can't go to sleep. An electric pad helps a little, but not enough. But these inner soles have my feet so warm and toasty that I have no problem doing without the inner soles when I'm actually in bed. And my feet seem to stay warm all night.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barstow

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome and keep my feet warm
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and keep my feet warm! I am working outside covering games most of the time and they last at least 8 hours. The contents do shift a little which can be uncomfortable but I don't mind as long as my feet are warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S.

customer_reviews.title: Heats well even under extreme conditions.
customer_reviews.text: These insoles heat way better than a toe warmer as they are warmer and heat the entire area of your feet. My only complaint was I wore them on an aggressive hike one day and it forced the material in the insole to move around and clump up which caused some discomfort. I still recommend them and give them a five star rating overall!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Not for petite feet, otherwise awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Economical and reliable for a solid 8-9 hours of sole-soothing heat. Be aware that these are larger than other similar products and can't be cut down. I have big feet, so it wasn't a problem, lol. They perform as advertised. Just not for petite feet. Update: I used a pair of these to make a "heated seat" for a road trip, and they worked like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: kynundrum

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I would never ever use this product again I demand a full refund my feet were literally on fire as you can see in the video yes that’s Smoke and burnt residue buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these. They are the only things that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They are the only things that I have found to keep my feet warm sitting outside at baseball games. Beware if you walk in them a lot your feet are going to get extremely hot
customer_reviews.author: KarenG

customer_reviews.title: Thick cardboard backing (no adhesive) is uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: There is actually no adhesive--that part of the description is a lie. Instead there's a thick cardboard backing which makes the insoles very uncomfortable. They're warm enough but what's the point if so uncomfortable?
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Wortis

customer_reviews.title: was a bad idea for stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: i thought this was a great idea for stocking stuffer is a plain white wrapping, nothing to show what it is, no instructions, nothing to tell the recipient 'don't eat me' not like shown in product picture
customer_reviews.author: Misty Lara Prendville

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - Especially if you like toasty feet
customer_reviews.text: I discovered a way to regulate the heat and make the product last longer. Purchase a pair of Dr. Scholls foot pillow and place it on top of the Foot Warmer pad. It will help keep the pad from getting too hot and make it last longer because less air will get to the Foot Warmer pad
customer_reviews.author: PROracks

customer_reviews.title: I finally have warm feet
customer_reviews.text: The insoles stayed warmer, longer than I expected. The one downside is that as far as I could tell, they only come in one size which is too large for some of my shoes. But they fit my boots just fine and I finally have warm feet!
customer_reviews.author: grace pearl

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Aside from being uncomfortable these 'warmers' provided somewhere between minimal heat to no heat at all. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: A. Biermans

customer_reviews.title: Short life span 2 hrs at best
customer_reviews.text: Worst foot warmers I have ever purchased. 17 degrees in the woods today lasted a total of of 2 hrs. Had to use 4 pairs to get through 8 hrs of a 10 hour hunting trip in the woods. Thought it was a great deal what a waste. I will not use the rest went to store tonight and purchased Hot Hands brand which I know work .
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Truax

customer_reviews.title: No adhesion
customer_reviews.text: They do get hot but they are made for large feet, 10-12 Womens. They do not stay in place and there were no instructions enclosed. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SDSteele

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Fits in boots perfectly and stays hot all day. I had no issues being cold. If you are one of those people that has cold hands and feet allll the time, these will work perfect and are much cheaper than the electronic socks. If you are the person who occasionally is cold, this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Waiten

customer_reviews.title: Good but Not good
customer_reviews.text: They really do keep you warm, However if you're on your feet all day As I am The longer you walk the Harder they become... hot asphalt
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn E. Streeter Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Gets too hot
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were going to be just like hot hands but they get way too hot. When you first activate them you would have to wait for them to cool down to put the soul into your shoe to even walk around in them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Disposable foot warmers
customer_reviews.text: Great item to package for the homeless. Seller got the items here SUPER FAST! Seller also included a few pairs of socks to the order!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Grace

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Midwest winters are COLD, and if my feet are cold, all of me is cold. These fit nicely in my shoes without any lumps or discomfort, and warmed me significantly. No need to reserve these just for skiing or other outdoor outings - if you are cold, a pair of these in your shoes will warm you for the entire day!
customer_reviews.author: S Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fit.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is suffering with poyneurghy. So if I can help him medical anyway to his life comfortable. I do it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware bulk packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the product is great but annoyed it came bulk packaged and not individually like the picture would suggest. These were supposed to be stocking stuffers but can’t give blank unbranded packages without instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne C.

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: They are doing a good job but have not had real clid weather yet! I would have rated them 41/2 had ths been an option.
customer_reviews.author: Win Allred

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. Just received them and tried them last night outside in 45 degrees on concrete. Frostbite on my toes and these helped SO much. First time my toes haven't hurt all winter
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Kropuenske

customer_reviews.title: Foot warmer
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderful. Kept my feet warm. Not hot. I work outside and my feet always felt cold. But wearing these foot warmers kept them nice and warm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage knockoff, doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I received 4 bags of unbranded insole foot warmers that so far do not seem to work very well. Not very happy with what I received and that I cant return them since some have already been used to little or no effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use with socks
customer_reviews.text: Do not place directly against skin. It will burn. Otherwise they do warm your feet nicely
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Body heater didn’t work so well hot hands were excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The hot hands worked excellent. The body warmers didn’t work as well. I did t try the foot warmers yet but will review when I do
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Molina

customer_reviews.title: They work OK....
customer_reviews.text: ....but are so "thick" that my shoes don't fit really tightly with them inside. Perhaps need some footwear that's a little big for use with these?
customer_reviews.author: Kansas Annie

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible they dont heat,they stick terribly to the backing I ruined 3 before I got one to work.They are so thick my shoes dont fit and they dont heat.Total waste of money dont buy these.
customer_reviews.author: lisa levin

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: These keep my boyfriend's feet warm he works outside every night. I even got a gift with them
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Seales

customer_reviews.title: TRIED 'EM ALL: BEST BUY 4 REGULAR USE
customer_reviews.text: As a "War-Baby" with a strong, lifelong dose of econo-eye, dealing with weakening blood circulation, I use these 4 both walking & sleeping. Overall, they let me keep enjoying winter--& sleep--at about a 3rd less cost than the Name Brand, while imo working just as easily & as well--which makes them my choice. Am I missin' sum'um?
customer_reviews.author: Sholom B

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Becomes hard after about 2 hours so becomes uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Trish Uptigrove

customer_reviews.title: Feels like walking on rocks..
customer_reviews.text: Gets warm but doesnt stay that way once you are outside. They start lumping up when you walk feeling like you are walking with rocks in your boots..
customer_reviews.author: momdukes12

customer_reviews.title: There is no resealing.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that they do keep your feet warm. What I did not like is that they come packaged together. I prefer that each come in their separate package
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Don't get warm
customer_reviews.text: They don't get warm at all. They get very clumpy and there is no way to keep them in place. Waste of money. Going to try and return them.
customer_reviews.author: mull

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: these are equal or better than gloves costing well over $100.00
customer_reviews.author: THE EMPEROR

customer_reviews.title: Good short term but not for 8 hours.
customer_reviews.text: They stick well to your sock but feel stiff to walk on for long periods. The warmth is good but although advertised as 8 hours they fade quickly after about 5 hours. I wear a size 12 shoe but these “Large” only cover from my heel to the ball of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for any polar vortex!
customer_reviews.text: Worked in the polar vortex. I walked all over Brooklyn in 12 degree weather like i was walking in the sand! These work!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your feet warm!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Very comfortable in shoe/boots! Keeps your feet very warm!!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This is a dangerous product - do not depend on it. I was only outside 30 minutes in 30 degree weather. My feet are like blocks of ice - soooo painful! I generally use Hot Hands brand Toe Warmer and can stay outside for hours, even in colder weather, and my feet stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: Scott V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for a trip to Japan when it was cold. They kept my toes toasty!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The are the perfect warmth, but do not have an adhesive back to keep them in place. Whether to socks or soles of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharese Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Insoles
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as other foot warmers I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Jones

customer_reviews.title: Hot longer
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this product because I thought it was exactly what being advertised. They aren’t, no sticky backing. I repurchased then because they cover the entire foot and stay hot longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best feet warmers ever
customer_reviews.text: As a mailman these are the best thing I’ve ever tried to keep my feet warm. I’m not even worried about how cold it is now cause I know my feet will be warm all day. Will buy more when I run out. Hopefully don’t have to use all 40 this season
customer_reviews.author: David Forman

customer_reviews.title: Keep warm when chills start.
customer_reviews.text: The company is great. This product is absolutely wonderful in the shoe. They could improve in a few spots. As for the hands, you can't keep them warm while working but the warmers really warm up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: 2/3rd did not work
customer_reviews.text: 2/3rds of the warmers did not work. The material inside the DOA warmers was all hard and clumped together, As opposed to loose and shakeable (the ones that worked.) My guess is that the packaging was faulty and allowed oxygen in.
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG JUNG

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Still need to know how to return these. They were worthless on my trip to Iceland in early March. One of them became like a rock in my shoe!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These work. I wear them dog sledding and my feet are never cold. The heat lasts hours longer than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband is SO Happy with these. He said they are the BEST foot warmers he’s ever used. I certainly will continue to buy these for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've only used one pair. They got hot initially but heat did not last long- about 30 minutes. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: My husband puts them in his work boots. We live in Alaska and they do help keep his feet warm when he works outside. They seem to keep the heat most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They keep my husbands feet warm. In the beginning they are to warm.
customer_reviews.author: vlc

customer_reviews.title: resin shifts making the insole very bumpy and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Used the product for a winter hike. Had to remove since the resin 'collected' under my arch making the insole very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CottageFun

customer_reviews.title: These don’t work.
customer_reviews.text: These were junk. Got slightly warm for all of about 20 minutes. Don’t waste your money. Good thing they are biodegradable, since I’ll be throwing them all out right now.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Barry

customer_reviews.title: I am not leaving the house without my warmers
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item . Very helpful in the cold winter days
customer_reviews.author: talisapir

customer_reviews.title: Some get too hot
customer_reviews.text: Some of them get very hot. I never know until I open one to put them on. So I hope it doesn’t get to hot , cause I hate not to be able to use them after I paid for em .
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Bisterfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Poor heating. Especially the foot warmers. Barley tell they’re producing any heat at all. Also bought another brand that worked much better and lasted longer. They cost a little more but they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Really warm!
customer_reviews.text: Worked so well for a cold football season! Kept my feet super warm and was pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindleaholic

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they keep you feet warm
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, but a lot to like. Kept my feet warm all day while volunteering on a winter day in Northern Minnesota.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Barels

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.text: Half of them didn’t work. They seemed like they were old and hard as a rock!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was an ok buy.
customer_reviews.text: It did get hot, but not for 8hrs. More like 3hrs. I wear a size 6, and they fit. But where too small for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO ADHESIVE
customer_reviews.text: NO ADHESIVE! Is it just a random selection that has adhesive? Why is it advertised that they have adhesive? This product SUCKS!
customer_reviews.author: Bwood

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product my feet were warm for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Good when you are walking. Reduces in intensity when sitting.
customer_reviews.text: Great for outdoors. Good for indoors too. But you have to take a walk to increase the heat. Lasted for 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh D. Kulkarni

customer_reviews.title: Walking in the winter
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me walking for excercise in the winter near Chicago
customer_reviews.author: terryb

customer_reviews.title: Burnt my foot
customer_reviews.text: I’m diabetic and these burnt my feet!! I had a blister for a week and still have a scar. Yes, I wore a sock between my foot and the warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Toasty toes
customer_reviews.text: I used this for winter hiking, and my feet stayed toasty.:)
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a long parade. Life savers. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a long parade. Life savers. It was 25 degrees and our feet were so warm. No complaints. Used for 8 hours
customer_reviews.author: Circle Head T Rex

customer_reviews.title: I must have gotten old box because...
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a old box because these provided zero heat.
customer_reviews.author: Booker T Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: There was supposed to be a part of it that would peel off so it would stick to the bottom of the sock. NOTHING. There was no attachment. Not satisfied with this at all!!!!! Have used a similar product from another company (not from china, but from France) and it was awesome. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. DeGeiso

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date on the outside of the box was current ...
customer_reviews.text: Expiration date on the outside of the box was current but the actual product inside expired over a year ago!
customer_reviews.author: Mucho Macho

customer_reviews.title: You know how parents will not buy things for self ...
customer_reviews.text: You know how parents will not buy things for self. Well my Dad has reached his 80s and his toes stay cold. Winter is coming so I sent these. His feet remain warm now. It makes it easier to walk. I usually visit this time of year but Hurricane Harvey delayed that so I sent heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J Page

customer_reviews.title: 00pm when I took them out of my boots what a foot saver great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a wolf hunt in Canada put them in at 11:00am and they where still warm at 7:00pm when I took them out of my boots what a foot saver great product
customer_reviews.author: Charles  R Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not adhere, and slips around in shoe when putting shoe on
customer_reviews.author: Gina Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reliable warmth
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for keeping my polio leg warm. I put them along lower leg between 2 pairs of socks.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R Bjornstad

product_meta.title: WORLD-BIO Disposable Insole Foot Warmers 5/10/16/20/40 Pairs Value Pack - Provide 12 Plus Hour Heating, Long Lasting Safe Natural Odorless Air Activated Warm Pack for Toe/Hand/Body
feature_bullets: NATURAL & LONG-LASTING HEAT - 10 Individual large size warmer pads, durable to last work UP TO 8 PLUS hours. Odorless, disposable, single-use Item. One pair per package. No leaking, safe to use. One pair aluminum foil insole gift.

USING EVENTS - Single use air-activated heat packs that provide everyday warmth and are ideal for keeping your body warm when the temperature gets cold. Useful for outdoor sporting events, hunting & fishing, camping & hiking.

SHOE PAD DESIGN - Ultra thin and full length of insole for keeping entire foot warming. Quick & long-lasting heat,uniform heating. No need to adhere, it will stay in shoes flatly like shoe pad. Convenient, Compact, Portable.

AIR ACTIVATED - Remove warmer from outer package, air activated. Warmer heats up in 5-10 minutes. If heat decreases, expose warmer to air and shake. Eco-friendly iron ingredients with soft non-woven fabric without peculiar smell.

MULTIPURPOSE WARMERS - The combination of the ingredients has been specially formulated to ensure a constant and comforting heat for a wide variety of uses. They’re available in several styles designed for your hands, feet, and body. Do Not Apply Directly to The Skin.
